messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Critical Power Failure

Abnormal activity detected in Space Station 13's powernet. As a precautionary measure, the station's power will be shut off for an indeterminate duration.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body:
Good morning station. Due to the recent reports, we will be sending an Official Centcomm Inspector in 10 minutes.

Failure to meet minimal standards will result in the termination of this project.

Thank you for your understanding,

Centcomm.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

High levels of radiation detected near the station. Maintenance is best shielded from radiation.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

The radiation threat has passed. Please return to your workplaces.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body:
Please note: 5 minutes till the arrival of our inspector.

Failure to meet standards will result in the termination of this project.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Due to lack of objections from the crew, our inspector will be arriving shortly.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Please standby for arrival of ferry.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to budget-cuts, a horde of rodents have descended into the place with all those juicy wires.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body:
Telecommunications power offline. Please use officially sanctioned emergency channels.

146.1 is not an official channel.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Due to the failure of your station, an appropriate shuttle has been sent for evacuation.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Ionospheric anomalies detected. Temporary telecommunication failu*3mga;b4;'1vï¿½-BZZZT

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Critical Power Failure

Abnormal activity detected in Space Station 13's powernet. As a precautionary measure, the station's power will be shut off for an indeterminate duration.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on our omnipotence, we believe that one of the station's simple animals has developed security level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.
